夏館: (なつやかた) - villa arranged appropriately for summer; mansion arranged appropriately for summer
夏鳥: (なつどり) - a bird of summer
夔鳳文: (きほうもん) - inscription of a fantastic birdlike creature found on Yin and Zhou dynasty bronze ware, etc.
夔鳳鏡: (きほうきょう) - intricately inscribed ancient bronze or iron mirror featuring a pair of firebirds
夕ご飯: (ゆうごはん) - evening meal; dinner; supper
夕べ: (ゆうべ) - (夕べ, 夕 only) evening; (ゆうべ, さくや only) (usu. 昨夜) last night
夕冷え: (ゆうびえ) - evening chill; cool of the evening
夕凉: (ゆうすずみ) - evening cool; cool of the evening
夕張メロン: (ゆうばりメロン) - Yuubari melon (sweet orange melon grown in Yuubari City, Hokkaido)
夕影鳥: (ゆうかげどり) - lesser cuckoo (Cuculus poliocephalus)
夕御飯: (ゆうごはん) - evening meal; dinner; supper
夕日: (せきじつ) - evening sun; setting sun
夕日に彩られた空: (ゆうひにいろどられたそら) - sky colored by the setting sun; sky coloured by the setting sun
夕明り: (ゆうあかり) - lingering light of evening
夕暉: (せっき) - rays of the setting sun
夕暮れ族: (ゆうぐれぞく) - couple with older man and younger woman; May-December romance
夕涼: (ゆうすずみ) - evening cool; cool of the evening
夕涼み: (ゆうすずみ) - evening cool; cool of the evening
夕焼けは晴れ朝焼けは雨: (ゆうやけははれあさやけはあめ) - Red sky at night, shepherd's delight Red sky in the morning, shepherd's warning
夕空: (ゆうぞら) - evening sky; twilight sky
夕立ちにあう: (ゆうだちにあう) - to be caught in an evening shower
夕立にあう: (ゆうだちにあう) - to be caught in an evening shower
夕立に遭う: (ゆうだちにあう) - to be caught in an evening shower
夕陽: (せきよう) - evening sun; setting sun
夕雲: (ゆうぐも) - early evening cloud; clouds at sunset
夕霞: (ゆうがすみ) - evening breeze; evening mist
夕靄: (ゆうもや) - evening haze or mist
夕顔: (ゆうがお) - bottle gourd (Lagenaria siceraria, esp. Lagenaria siceraria var. hispida); moonflower (Ipomoea alba)
夕食抜き: (ゆうしょくぬき) - without having supper
外: (fora/outro/externo/além/deveria) - outside , outside, exterior; open air; other place
外す: (はずす) - to unfasten/to undo; to remove/to take off/to deinstall; to leave/to step out/to slip away; (ant: 当たる・1) to miss (a target)
外でもない: (ほかでもない) - what I want to say is ...; the fact of the matter is ...
外で遊ぶ: (そとであそぶ) - to play outdoors
外ならない: (ほかならない) - (usu. as 〜に他ならない)  nothing but; none other than
外ならぬ: (ほかならぬ) - nothing but; none other than
外なる: (そとなる) - outer (self, etc.); external (conflict, tension, competition, etc.)
外に何か: (ほかになにか) - is there anything else?
外また: (そとまた) - (walking with) one's toes turned out; duckfooted
外れる: (はずれる) - to be disconnected; to get out of place; to be off; to be out (e.g. of gear)
外れ品: (はずれひん) - faulty product/faulty goods; consolation prize
外を探す: (ほかをさがす) - to search somewhere else
外タレ: (がいタレ) - non-Japanese celebrity; foreigner celebrity
外交チャンネル: (がいこうチャンネル) - diplomatic channel
外交交渉: (がいこうこうしょう) - diplomatic negotiations; negotiations through diplomatic channels
外交体制: (がいこうたいせい) - diplomatic structure
外交史: (がいこうし) - history of diplomacy; history of foreign policy
外交員: (がいこういん) - canvasser; door-to-door salesman
外交問題: (がいこうもんだい) - diplomatic issue
外交委員長: (がいこういいんちょう) - head of the Foreign Relations Committee
